title: User under 21
custom_preconds: MGM has decided that they no longer want players who are under 21 to be able to register / play Rally.
custom_expected:
During registration, anyone who is under 21 is locked out of the app as soon as they create their account. 

Players can not go back and change their age once seeing that screen.

Current players who are under 21 can still play and do not need to be removed. This only pertains to new players.
(per Jeremy: They can until they log out. Once they log out, then they won’t be allowed in again.)

title: Email Verification
custom_expected:
New functionality should be added for email verification when user signs up.

User should not be able to proceed into the app until the email verification process is complete. 

**IT HAS NOT BEEN DEVELOPED YET!**

title: Carousel image on transition
custom_steps:
1. Play 2-3 games from the Rally home screen
2. From the home screen, the carousel should have 2-3 active contests
3. Swipe to the last contest of the carousel.
4. Tap the game from the carousel, or any game from today's games
5. As the game screens transitions to the deck, the carousel image will re-set to the first game
custom_expected: Carousel image remains consistent on transition

title: Prop resolution
custom_expected: User is able to see the resolution for the same prop separately in Pick 10 and Pro Play

1. Make prediction for the same prop in Pick 10 and Pro Play. (pick the same option)
2. Go to Pick 10
3. Go to Pro Play
custom_steps_separated.expected: User sees the prop resolution in Pick 10 and Pro Play

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Make prediction for the same prop in Pick 10 and Pro Play. (pick the same option)
2. Go to Pro Play
3. Go to Pick 10
custom_steps_separated.expected: User sees the prop resolution in Pro Play and Pick 10

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Make prediction for the same prop in Pick 10 and Pro Play. (pick different options)
2. Go to Pick 10
3. Go to Pro Play
custom_steps_separated.expected: User sees the prop resolution in Pick 10 and Pro Play

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Make prediction for the same prop in Pick 10 and Pro Play. (pick different options)
2. Go to Pro Play
3. Go to Pick 10
custom_steps_separated.expected: User sees the prop resolution in Pro Play and Pick 10

title: Scores on Home tab
custom_expected: Pro score should be priority.EZ scores should not be displayed on home tab at all.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Play Pro game first. Make sure to have resolution and have scores
2. Then play Live 10. Make sure to have resolution and have scores
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro Play scores are displayed on the home tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Play Live 10 game first. Make sure to have resolution and have scores
2. Then play Pro game. Make sure to have resolution and have scores
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro Play scores are displayed as soon as the first played prop gets resolved

custom_steps_separated.content: 1. Play Live 10 game only
custom_steps_separated.expected: No scores are displayed on the home tab

title: Expanded Card Auto - Close
custom_expected: In the middle of viewing an OD or ITH card in expanded mode, if then there is an inning change over, the expanded mode should automatically close and show blank card.

custom_steps_separated.content: Hold the deck with one finger while you tap the [!] button with another.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The resolution animation should not execute until you lift your finger, upon which it moves forward normally.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Make a prediction, exit the game, go back to it when prop is resolved. 
Do not tap on ! and continue to make predictions (swipe up and down)
custom_steps_separated.expected: The resolution does not pop up until user clicks on !

title: Limited Strikezone Resolution
custom_expected:
Limited strikezone cards should resolve with a limited strikezone as well.
Per Andrew it won't be fixed soon

title: Edge case - Expanded Card Auto
custom_expected: In the middle of viewing an OD or ITH card in expanded mode, if then there is an inning change over, the expanded mode should automatically close and shows blank card.

custom_steps_separated.content: Live 10 - When 3rd inning is about to happen, open the On Deck or In The Hole card and stay there until the card is withdrawn
custom_steps_separated.expected: The expanded mode should automatically close and the new batter up card should be displayed (unzoomed)

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro Play - When 3rd inning is about to happen, open the On Deck or In The Hole card and stay there until the card is withdrawn
custom_steps_separated.expected: The expanded mode should automatically close and the new batter up card should be displayed (unzoomed)

custom_steps_separated.content: Live 10 - User made predictions, then user unselected prediction before the prop got locked
custom_steps_separated.expected: The carousel should not show this game

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro Play - User made predictions, then user unselected prediction before the prop got locked
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* The carousel should not show this game. 
* The contest list on the Home tab should not highlight that game, the button should say PLAY NOW

custom_steps_separated.content:
Live 10:
- Make prediction
- Exit the contest
- Go back to the contest when prop is resolved
- do not click on !, swipe up and down, open other props
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is able to swipe up and down, open other props, make predictions. The resolved prop does not show the resolution until user clicks on !

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro Play:
- Make prediction
- Exit the contest
- Go back to the contest when prop is resolved
- do not click on !, swipe up and down, open other props
custom_steps_separated.expected: User is able to swipe up and down, open other props, make predictions. The resolved prop does not show the resolution until user clicks on !

custom_steps_separated.content: Live 10
custom_steps_separated.expected: Card and Expanded Card Image match

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro Play
custom_steps_separated.expected: Card and Expanded Card Image match

title: Number of picks bar
custom_expected:
* The number of picks for Easy Play should default to 10.

* The number of segments on the easy play bar should always reflect the number of picks required by the player. 

* The text under the easy play bar should always reflect the number of picks required by the player. 

* The bar should be displayed in 2 places: game splitted screen and inside the Easy Play contest

title: First card displayed
custom_expected: When opening EZ from the splitter screen, the first card to be shown should be At bat or Batter Up card (if no at bat available)

title: 'Rally Lite' props flow
custom_expected:
* Once the game begins, AB, OD, and ITH props should be shown to the player just like in Pro Play. 

* If the player has enough picks remaining, he can make a pick on any open prop.

* As soon as a pick is made, the number of picks remaining immediately decrements. 

* If the player deselects their choice on an open prop, the number of picks remaining immediately increments. 

* If the player has no picks remaining, then the buttons on any open props are grayed out.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6954902) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/6954903) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/6954904)

title: Cards in the stack

* The card should stay in the card stack.

custom_steps_separated.expected:
* The card will pop up in front of the user.
* The card will resolve.
* The card will wait two seconds.
* The card will be animated out to the left of the deck. (NOT remain in the card stack). The card should exit stage left after a 2 second delay
* This will NOT show the [!] button but it will be auto resolved right when its resolution happens.

title: Quick Pick link
custom_expected: Clicking on the Quick Pick card will open a WKWebView for Quick Pick. (URL: https://www.mlb.com/apps/rally/quickpick/)

custom_steps_separated.expected: The cell will stay in the contest list and be clickable until the end of time.

title: Beat the streak section on Home's tab

Things to be displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* Beat the streak logo (in neon green)
* Pick two players to get a hit during today's games. Beat a streak of 56 hits to win the cash jackpot!
* $1 MILLION
* PLAY NOW

![](index.php?/attachments/get/8299141)

title: Prizes for each day of baseball
custom_expected:
* Each day of baseball should have contests with various prizes associated with them.
* Each day, contest prizing is chosen randomly amongst all of the contests that day. 
* Assign one contest prize from each of the following buckets (in the order listed here) to a RANDOM contest up until the MAX number listed for each prize type:

Cash (MAX: 2)
XP (MAX: 2)
Tokens (MAX: 3)
Each MAX value is also configurable on the server.

If, at any point, there are no remaining contests to assign a prize to, then stop assigning prizes.

title: Prize types
custom_expected:
Physical Prizes: Cash, Mystery boxes
Virtual Prizes: Extra Tokens, Extra XP, Specific Lenses, Random Lens of given rarity

title: Extra tokens
custom_expected:
There should be some contests that allow user to earn extra Tokens.
For each contest that is offering “Extra Tokens” as its prize:

custom_steps_separated.content: When awarding tokens during the end of game flow, there should be a “BONUS TOKENS” section that is shown that separates the additional bonus amount into its own line.
The header image should be changed to the Bonus Tokens prize header and include text that says “Earn bonus Tokens by competing in this contest!”
The amount of additional tokens earned should be a percentage of the base amount that they earn and configureable on the server.
The default amount of tokens earned should be set to 20% extra.

title: Extra XP
custom_expected:
There should be some contests that allow user to earn extra XP.
For each contest that is offering “Extra XP” as its prize:

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6767488)![](index.php?/attachments/get/6767489)![](index.php?/attachments/get/6767490)

custom_steps_separated.content: When awarding XP during the end of game flow, there should be a “BONUS XP” section that is shown that separates the additional bonus amount into its own line.
The header image should be changed to the Bonus XP prize header and include text that says “Earn bonus XP by competing in this contest!”
The amount of additional XP earned should be a percentage of the base amount that they earn and configureable on the server.
The default amount of XP earned should be set to 10% extra.

title: Rally Lenses
custom_expected: User is be able to win Rally Lenses from an individual contest.

title: Digital Wallet
custom_expected:
* When players win cash, a digital wallet balance is updated to reflect their winnings.
* Players can see their wallet balance in their profile.
* Players can click into their wallet to launch a web view.

title: Notification on profile page
custom_expected:
* In the User Profile screen, the notifications option should be clickable and it takes the user to a new sub-screen. 

* On the new screen, there should be three option toggles. These three toggles should be:

* Global Notifications - Toggling this turns on and off ALL other sub-notification toggles.

* “Pre-game Reminder” - toggling this turns on and off the “Time to make your picks” notification that is sent each morning at 10am ET.

* If the player tries to turn on a notification and has that notification option turned off in the settings, the user is shown a pop-up that shows them that they need to turn on notifications in the profile screen.
